test_name: School Manager Users Tab Access and Role-Based Permissions
description: Verify that a school manager can access the /users route and see appropriate tabs with correct permissions
Verify that all main navigation links work correctly and navigate to the expected pages

test_name: Navigation Menu Highlighting and Active States
description: Verify that navigation menu items are properly highlighted when selected and maintain correct active states
Verify that navigation switches correctly between desktop side navigation and mobile bottom navigation
